titleStmt.title: Considerations concerning the present Engagement, whether it may lawfully be entered into; yea or no? / Written at the desire of a friend, by J.D. November 27. 1649. Imprimatur, Joseph Caryl.
titleStmt.author: Dury, John, 1596-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Clowes for Richard Wodenoth, at the Starre under St. Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb: 4th"; the author's initials expanded to J. D"ury".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
